title: Geoip Lookup
description: This stage will lookup geo location from an ip address field.

skip.title: Skip This Stage
skip.description: Set to true to skip this stage.

label.title: Label
label.description: A unique label for this stage.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: Define a conditional script that must result in true or false. This can be used to determine if the stage should process or not.

blobId.title: Geoip Lookup Database Blob ID
blobId.description: The ID of the Geoip Lookup database file stored in the Fusion blob store. Leave blank to use the default one.

hostnameField.title: Hostname Field
hostnameField.description: Specify the field that contains a hostname to be looked up.

ipAddrField.title: IP Address Field
ipAddrField.description: Specify the field that contains an IP address to be looked up.
